body_html: The ClusterSpec class might be used with many different naming schemes, so the appropriate place to put the validation is in grpc_server_lib.cc around this line.
body_text: The ClusterSpec class might be used with many different naming schemes, so the appropriate place to put the validation is in grpc_server_lib.cc around this line.
body: The ClusterSpec class might be used with many different naming schemes, so the appropriate place to put the validation is in `grpc_server_lib.cc` around [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/66d5d1fa0c192ca4c9b75cde216866805eb160f2/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_server_lib.cc#L128).
